items.content:
Are you ready for the first Yoyovania?! In this 2D top-down adventure you'll explore a sprawling urban landscape, reinterpreting your surroundings through your mastery of yoyo tricks. Navigate the city's many districts, fight rival crime bosses, and regain the influence of the Pipistrello family!

Get your Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo game key now!
items.redemptionInstructions:
1. Copy your key from this page, or find it again in My Loot.
  2. Open your Steam client, click "Games" in the top menu and choose "Activate a Product on Steam…"
  3. Follow the on-screen instructions and insert your key.
  4. GGs and have fun!
items.title: Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo Giveaway

items.content:
In Call of Duty®: Black Ops 7, Treyarch and Raven Software are bringing players the most mind-bending Black Ops ever across an innovative Co-Op Campaign, an electrifying Multiplayer experience, and the legendary Round-Based Zombies mode.

Grab your 15 minute double-level XP boost now to get ahead of your fellow combatants!
items.redemptionInstructions:
1. Copy your key from this page, or find it again in My Loot.
  2. Click the link to head to Call of Duty's Official Game Page
  3. Log into your Activision account and follow the on-screen redemption instructions!
  4. GL HF!
items.title: Call of Duty®: Black Ops 7 Giveaway - Double Level XP
